synopsis: Having defeated Yukari Origami, Kanami and the others have garnered attention and are observed by Miruya. Special training begins to improve the investigation squad's teamwork by mimicking the closeness of Kanami and the others.

Tomorrow is Kanami's birthday! Mihono, Hiyori, and Mai go out in search of a present that will make Kanami the happiest. What are the presents that the three of them have come up with to give Kanami the best birthday ever?

Yukari Origami and the four members of the Elite Guard are enjoying a brief moment of peace viewing the flowers. Yume smiles brightly at spending time viewing the flowers with everyone, but she was not the only one who enjoyed their time.

Kiyoka asks Kofuki for help in picking out an outfit, and the pudding that she was planning to give her as a reward is gone! But the flames of Kofuki's prankster heart are lit by the items that are in the refrigerator.
Mai watches over Sayaka from morning until night. To her that is the natural course of each of their days. One day, Sayaka tries to leave Mai's side when she has business in the laboratory.

Today is the day that Yume Tsubakuro is supposed to join the newly formed Elite Guard, but she doesn't show up at all. Concerned by this, Maki and Suzuka go in search of her. Meanwhile, at the same time, Yomi has been given a different mission.

The Toji are enjoying their time in the hot springs at a ryokan in the mountains. However, the hot spring is especially prized by Kiyoka and Hiyori. Believing firmly in the hidden benefits of the hot spring, Kiyoka and Hiyori head straight for the large open bath.
